content: the arctic beanie is a crochet hat for winter that has a lovely texture created using the even moss stitch which i have modified to work in the round the texture of this crochet beanie is super pleasing to look at and wear but is a nice dense fabric that doesn t have many holes so your head and ears will stay nice and warm what s even better is this crochet hat pattern was designed to not only be warm but also be lightweight so you won t feel like you can t hold your head up while wearing it win/win/win note the arctic beanie was originally designed and released october 20 2020 the crochet beanie pattern was updated on october 31 2023 the brim of this crochet beanie has been updated to a different style which allows for a much more comfortable stretch additionally this pattern now comes with 5 sizes toddler child teen/adult small adult medium and adult large which has been highly requested the end result of the beanie is nearly the same the only major visual difference is the brim but i promise - it s much more comfy because of it s stretchy quality by purchasing this pattern you will receive 1 full version pdf with detailed photo tutorials for the special stitches yarn over slip_stitch working in the 3rd loop only single_crochet 2 together row 1 through 3 of the brim seaming the brim the body of the beanie and finally finishing the beanie this photo tutorial also has the steps written in detail not short hand 2 printer friendly pdf to save ink ★skill level intermediate crocheters looking to follow this crochet beanie pattern should know how to *read a crochet pattern - there is not a video tutorial for this crochet winter hat pattern *work the basic stitches - chain slip_stitch single_crochet and half_double_crochet *understand how to work into the sides of stitches like one would do to crochet a border *work in the round and close rounds *know how to single_crochet 2 together decrease or be willing to learn *be willing to either use stitch markers or pay close attention to stitches at the beginning and end of each round ★size s size head cir beanie cir brim height beanie height toddler 18 inches 16 inches 1 25 inches 7 inches child 19 inches 17 inches 1 5 inches 7 5 inches teen/adult s 21 inches 19 inches 2 inches 8 inches adult m 22 inches 20 inches 2 inches 8 5 inches adult l 23 inches 21 inches 2 inches 10 inches *cir = circumference s = small m = medium l = large beanie height includes brim height most sizes of this crochet winter hat pattern are close enough in height that if you feel the head circumference would be too small you can go one size up without the beanie being too tall ★materials required worsted medium 4 weight yarn of your choice though i would not
